dimensions.label: Problem Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems systematically and methodically, breaking them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their problem-solving approach, often relying on patterns and connections rather than step-by-step analysis.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Work Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle work tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach work tasks in a deliberate and structured manner, taking the time to plan and execute.
Your FarTwin will be flexible and able to adjust to changing circumstances and priorities, often prioritizing efficiency over strict adherence to plans.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out and value input from team members, using it to inform decisions and drive collective success.
Your FarTwin will tend to work independently, focusing on individual achievements and competing with others to meet or exceed goals.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will generally err on the side of caution, weighing potential risks and consequences before making decisions.
Your FarTwin will tend to take bold action, embracing uncertainty and pushing boundaries in pursuit of excitement and growth.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on objective analysis and evidence to inform their decision-making, seeking consensus through data-driven insights.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and gut feelings to guide decisions, often relying on personal experience and emotional connection.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly organized and structured in their approach to time management, prioritizing tasks based on importance and deadlines.
Your FarTwin will tend to prioritize flexibility and adaptability when it comes to scheduling and timing, often going with the flow and adjusting plans as needed.

dimensions.label: Growth Motivation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to continuously improve and advance, setting challenging goals for themselves and striving for excellence.
Your FarTwin will prioritize self-reflection and introspection, using experiences and setbacks as opportunities for growth and learning.
